posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hal Chase Holding Trophy Nice SGC 30 SOLD
posts.post_content:
This is a very presentable 30 with some creasing and chipping in the upper right corner.  A very sharp card for the technical grade.  Paypal money gift or money owed, please.

$old shipped 

Thanks for looking and have a great day!

Final Bump before Ebay.  Feel free to make an offer or take it!

Best,

Andy
